description: Rug, so-called 'dragon' type; dark blue field witrh geometrical floral and leaf designs, hook and 'S' shapes in blue, green, red and white. Two borders seperatews by a barber pole guard stripe. The outer stripe has a geometrical flower and knop pattern connectedd by vines on an ivory field. The innner border is of wine glass design on a rose field. Selvedged with cotton, short warp fringe at each end. Closely woven with nap cut very short. Ghiordes knot. Woolen warp; cotton woof.
title: Rug
